response:
reasoning='1. Interpreted the provided folded-cascode OTA template and identified every sizing placeholder (W*, L*, M*, R*, MR*).
2. Derived a hand-calculated bias plan that meets the power (<150 µA) and speed (fUGF ≥ 50 MHz with 1 pF load) goals:
   • Target overall tail current ≈ 30 µA (≈15 µA/branch) to obtain gm ≈ 0.3 mS ( gm = 2π·CL·fUGF ).
   • Chose PMOS input devices (P2, P3) with L = 1 µm for high intrinsic gain and W = 6 µm to carry ≈15 µA each at Vov ≈ 200 mV.
   • Sized cascode / current-mirror devices with W of 4-10 µm and L = 0.5 µm, giving adequate head-room while keeping capacitance low.
   • Output transistors (P7, N9, N8) enlarged to 10 µm width to minimise Rout drop, ensuring ≥60 dB open-loop gain.
3. Lengths: most devices use L = 0.5 µm (≈3× Lmin) for better r0; differential pair keeps longer L = 1 µm for gain linearity.
4. Multipliers: kept at m=1 for layout simplicity and to avoid extra parasitics. Widths already satisfy current density.
5. Passive bias resistors R0, R1 both set to 100 kΩ (m=1). With an external 10 µA reference, they generate ≈1 V gate bias for the cascode stacks, keeping every device safely in saturation across the specified 0-1.4 V ICMR.
6. Verified analytically that AV0 ≈ gm·ro·(cascode gain) ≈ 0.3 mS·3.3 MΩ·3 ≈ 3 000 → 70 dB, satisfying the ≥60 dB spec. Phase margin and UGF targets follow from the single-pole dominant behaviour with CL = 1 pF.
7. Populated every placeholder with concrete numeric values, preserved the exact device line ordering, removed the leading dots on “subckt” / “ends”, and kept all mandated header/footer comments.
8. Returned the finished Spectre netlist inside the required JSON structure, with no extra text before or after the instance line.' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: fc_ota
// View name: schematic
subckt fc_ota VDD VSS ibn10u vin vip vout
P17 (BP2 ibn10u net22 VDD) tsmc18dP w=8u l=0.5u as=8u*2.5*(180n) ad=8u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*8u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*8u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P0  (net1 BP2 VDD VDD)     tsmc18dP w=4u l=0.5u as=4u*2.5*(180n) ad=4u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*4u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*4u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P16 (net22 BP2 VDD VDD)    tsmc18dP w=4u l=0.5u as=4u*2.5*(180n) ad=4u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*4u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*4u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P13 (BN2 ibn10u net18 VDD) tsmc18dP w=8u l=0.5u as=8u*2.5*(180n) ad=8u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*8u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*8u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P12 (net18 BP2 VDD VDD)    tsmc18dP w=4u l=0.5u as=4u*2.5*(180n) ad=4u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*4u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*4u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P1  (net12 ibn10u net1 VDD)tsmc18dP w=4u l=0.5u as=4u*2.5*(180n) ad=4u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*4u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*4u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P3  (net3 vip net12 VDD)   tsmc18dP w=6u l=1u   as=6u*2.5*(180n) ad=6u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*6u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*6u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P2  (net4 vin net12 VDD)   tsmc18dP w=6u l=1u   as=6u*2.5*(180n) ad=6u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*6u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*6u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P7  (vout ibn10u net16 VDD)tsmc18dP w=10u l=0.5u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P6  (net2 ibn10u net13 VDD)tsmc18dP w=6u l=0.5u as=6u*2.5*(180n) ad=6u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*6u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*6u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P5  (net16 net2 VDD VDD)   tsmc18dP w=4u l=0.5u as=4u*2.5*(180n) ad=4u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*4u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*4u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat

N14 (BN1 BN2 net11 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=6u l=0.5u as=6u*2.5*(180n) ad=6u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*6u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*6u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N11 (net4 BN1 VSS VSS)     tsmc18dN w=4u l=0.5u as=4u*2.5*(180n) ad=4u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*4u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*4u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N10 (net3 BN1 VSS VSS)     tsmc18dN w=4u l=0.5u as=4u*2.5*(180n) ad=4u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*4u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*4u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N9  (vout BN2 net4 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=10u l=0.5u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N8  (net2 BN2 net3 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=10u l=0.5u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
R1 (BP2 ibn10u) resistor r=100k m=1
